getComments: SELECT f.FriendID, u.Username, u.Name, p.PostID, c.CommentText, c.CommentID, c.CommentLikes FROM user_information u LEFT JOIN friends f ON u.UserID = f.FriendID LEFT JOIN posts p ON p.UserID = f.FriendID LEFT JOIN comments c ON c.PostID = p.PostID WHERE f.UserID = ? and c.CommentID IS NOT NULL
addComment: INSERT INTO Comments (PostID, CommentText, UserID) VALUES (?,?,?)
